AttachPolicy.title: AttachPolicy
AttachPolicy.summary: Attaches a tag policy to an object.

CheckCreatedByEnabled.title: CheckCreatedByEnabled
CheckCreatedByEnabled.summary: Checks whether createdby tags are enabled.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions where the Tag service is available.

DetachPolicy.title: DetachPolicy
DetachPolicy.summary: Detaches a tag policy from an object.

GetConfigRuleReport.title: GetConfigRuleReport
GetConfigRuleReport.summary: Queries the basic information about the resource non-compliance report that is last generated.

GetPolicy.title: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.summary: Queries the details of a tag policy.

GetPolicyEnableStatus.title: GetPolicyEnableStatus
GetPolicyEnableStatus.summary: Queries the status of the Tag Policy feature.

ListConfigRulesForTarget.title: ListConfigRulesForTarget
ListConfigRulesForTarget.summary: Queries a list of tag detection tasks for an object.

ListPolicies.title: ListPolicies
ListPolicies.summary: Queries a list of tag policies.

ListPoliciesForTarget.title: ListPoliciesForTarget
ListPoliciesForTarget.summary: Queries a list of tag policies that are attached to an object.

ListResourcesByTag.title: ListResourcesByTag
ListResourcesByTag.summary: Queries resources to which a specified tag is added or resources to which a specified tag is not added.

ListSupportResourceTypes.title: ListSupportResourceTypes
ListSupportResourceTypes.summary: Queries the resource types supported by tags and tag-related capability items.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to the resources of various Alibaba Cloud services.

ListTagValues.title: ListTagValues
ListTagValues.summary: Queries the tag values of a tag key.

ListTargetsForPolicy.title: ListTargetsForPolicy
ListTargetsForPolicy.summary: Queries the objects to which a tag policy is attached.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to the resources of various Alibaba Cloud services.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from the resources of various Alibaba Cloud services.
